mapper.delete: delete from t_blog where id between #{beginId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and #{endId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
delete from t_blog where title like #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
delete from t_blog where title not like #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
delete from t_blog where title like CONCAT('%', #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
delete from t_blog where title like CONCAT( #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
delete from t_blog where title like CONCAT('%', #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
delete from t_blog where UPPER(title) = UPPER(#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
delete from t_blog where age = true
delete from t_blog where age = false
